import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ModalService } from '../services/modal.service'; import { AuthService } from '../services/auth.service'; import { AngularFireAuth } from '@angular/fire/compat/auth'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent implements OnInit { constructor( public modal: ModalService, public auth: AuthService, ) { } ngOnInit(): void { } openModal($event: Event) { $event.preventDefault() this.modal.toggleModal('auth') } }
